name: A Totally Awesome Game About Crossing The Road
name_original: A Totally Awesome Game About Crossing The Road
description:
Do you ever feel like the main character crossing the road? 

Well now you can play a game that is literally just that!

A Totally Awesome Game About Crossing The Road is a silly little game made by yours truly. Simply make your way down to the bottom of the screen whilst listening to some sick 80s jams.
